description:
Regression in xenapi driver - the agent update code in _configure_new_instance_with_agent should be called after the instance's networking is configured.  

The https://github.com/rackerlabs/openstack-guest-agents-windows-xenserver agent makes an HTTP call to update itself.
title: xenapi: Agent update ordering
